title: Day 926
content:
# Day 926

Today, I became a homeowner - a milestone that's both exhilarating and surreal. It's a fantastic step for my family, but let's not forget the less glamorous co-star: the mortgage. Imagine signing up for a marathon you didn't train for, then realizing it lasts 30 years. Talk about a long-term commitment!

![This is an AI house not my real house](https://miro.medium.com/1*aCiHj_iRsP_aHxAWaMzQXQ.png)

Despite the financial tightrope walk ahead, I'm genuinely thrilled to start building equity in a place where my family can put down roots and grow. It feels strange to say it out loud: me, a homeowner? I always thought I'd be funneling my spare cash into Bitcoin, dreaming of digital riches. But as it turns out, you can't curl up with a warm laptop at night or host Thanksgiving dinner in the blockchain.

So here we are, keys in hand, ready to paint the town... or at least my bedroom.

10/3/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
